short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows Rate My Professors ratings next to names when signing up for classes at your university's registration portal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An open-source chrome extension. You can use it to quickly check professors' ratings from Rate My Professors on your university's course registration webpage.

Rate My University Professors currently supports Michigan State University and Wayne State University only.

How to Use:
Pin and click the icon on the toolbar to display ratings.

Feel free to contribute with new/improved features here:
https://github.com/advaitpaliwal/rate-my-university-professors
